name: PII Message Redaction
description: Customer shares PAN number - redaction enforced, never echoed

scenario.customerReport: My card number is 4532-1234-5678-9012 and I want to report fraud.

expectedActions.originalMessage: My card number is 4532-1234-5678-9012 and I want to report fraud.
expectedActions.redactedMessage: My card number is ****REDACTED**** and I want to report fraud.
